Example.Name: SYSCFG_PVDLock
Example.Description:
This example shows how to configure the SYSCFG to enable and lock the PVD connection to TIM1 Break input.
In this example: - TIM1 is configured to generate a PWM signal on pin PA.08. - PVD threshold is configured to 2.9V.
While Vdd is higher than the PVD threshold (2.9V), PWM signal is displayed on PA.08. While Vdd is lower than the PVD threshold (2.9V), PA.08 is in low level.
